message: NCDFReader supports mmap kwarg and tests
new Cython-based DCD file handling code
TST: Added first draft of testing module for new Cython-based DCD file handling interface.
ENH: restored DCD-related import checking in MDAnalysis/coordinates/__init__.py after upstream python 3 fixes.
ENH: added py3 compatibility for block_import.
ENH: New DCD reading code now appears to handle unit cell information properly. All tests in test_libdcd.py pass in python 2.7 and 3.5.
ENH: Fixed an IOError message in libdcd.pyx that referred to TRR files instead of DCD files.
ENH: Added proper DCDFile remarks / header string handling -- all unit tests now pass in python 2.7 & 3.5
DCDFile variables that are testing-only / implementation details are now prefixed with an underscore in response to comments in PR#1155.
Replaced a standard library assertion with a numpy assertion in the libdcd test suite  based on reviewer feedback in PR#1155.
DCDFile now allows overwriting  based on feedback in PR#1155.
current_frame variable is now updated in write method of DCDFile.
Removed spurious header writing  fixed an issue in write() method of DCDFile such that single-frame NAMD DCD trajectory writing exactly reproduces the coordinates from the input file.
Patched issue with frame iteration in test_coord_match -- all unit tests now pass.
added DCD regression tests against data from old DCDReader
DCD unit cell data handling and tests
test_header_remarks has been adjusted to perform a direct string comparison  as requested in PR comments.
Simplified code in test_iteration() unit test based on PR comments.
DCDWriteTestRandom now pins down the random seed for testing robustness.
Added new property-based unit test  test_written_remarks_property()  which reveals that DCDFile is not able to handle writing when an empty REMARKS string is provided.
use sensible warnings when only a header is written
start work on new dcd reader
move unitcell handling from libdcd to DCDReader
have readframes with start stop step
remove dcd from timestep API test
ENH: early work adding asv benchmark suite to MDA.
make scipy and matplotlib full dependencies (#1159)
test_libdcd test_seek_over_max() now appropriately checks for EOFError instead of IOError.
scipy and matplotlib are imported at top in analysis
removed conditional skipping of tests when scipy or matplotlib are missing
fix error in DCD Reader and remove confusing comment
add new timeseries tests to test_dcd

fix TRZ file reader on big-endian arches
Fix a syntax error in MDAnalysis.__init__ (#1432)
fixup CHANGELOG & setup.py with rebase cleaning

prefer to use format over string interpolation
uniformly use xyz to refer to coordinates in libdcd

push test loop into pytest parametrize

use netcdf for reading Amber netcdf but netCDF4 for writing
improve docs for libdcd and DCD
don't change dt when using nsavc for writing

Changed test name(s) from test_asymmetric_weight() to test_asymmetric_wavg_weight() and test_asymmetric_avg_weight()  need diff names for each test.
New names for (w)avg_hausdorff tests + reverting back to old (same) test names: test_asymmetric_weight()
Added two tests for Hausdorff neighbors--only the distances
Patched argument type checking logic in function dist_mat_to_vec()  and corresponding unit test is now more thorough (checks the specific error message string). Fixes #1498. (#1500)
New test for Hausdorff pair frames in pairs analysis  pairs analysis now also gives distance matrix
Rewrote TestLAMMPSDATAWriter to use pytest fixture (#1499)
Added fix  change  author sseyler to CHANGELOG  updated run_pairs_analysis docs for dist matrix D
The NamedStream class now has the required __fspath__ method (#1504)
Changed to old-style division in dist_mat_to_vec to ensure integer output
Added tests for topology string types with various formats. Fixes #1336. (#1518)
TST: Added a test for segid str type in test_str_types(). Fixes #1523. (#1528)

Small fixes/changes:  - Added future division and six.range to test_psa.py  - Separated pairs analysis (_run_pairs_analysis) from _run  moved plotting before  - Adding a couple distance matrix checks to PSAnalysis methods  - PSAnalysis.cluster now uses generated distance matrix D by default    and checks for proper dist matrix format if dist_mat kwarg is specified  - updated docstring for PSAnalysis.cluster
Added docstring in PSAnalysis.cluster for dist_mat kwarg

fixed Python 3 errors in analysis.hole and tests (#1532)
skip hole on osx for now.
